body:
IF ${1:statement} DO
	@ Your code here
ELSE IF ${2:statement} DO
	@ Your code here
ELSE DO
	@ Your code here
END

FUNCTION ${1:name} WITH ${2:args} DO
	@ Your code here
END

COUNT FROM ${1:start} AS ${2:i} TO ${3:end} STEP ${4:step} DO
	@ Your code here
END

WHILE ${1:statement} DO
	@ Your code here
END
